title: "Welcome, to our Republic..."
excerpt:
"Why, having been endowed with the courageous heart of a lion, do we live as mice?"


"A freeman ought not to be a slave in the acquisition of knowledge of any kind. Bodily exercise, when compulsory, does no harm to the body; but knowledge which is acquired under compulsion obtains no hold on the mind."


"When a man begins to get older, he will no longer be guilty of such insanity; he will imitate the dialectician who is seeking for truth, and not the eristic, who is contradicting for the sake of amusement; and the greater moderation of his character will increase instead of diminishing the honour of the pursuit."

title: Philosophy
excerpt: We want our members to grow with us in Like and Kind. We started with one NFT and know you will too.
